summary: THIS AIRBAG PROBLEM HAS BEEN ONGOING FOR SEVERAL MONTHS.  THE AIRBAG LIGHT CONTINUES TO BE ILLUMINATED AT ANY SPEED FOR THE PASSENGER SIDE.  THIS VEHICLE WAS RECALLED IN APRIL '14.  NHTSA RECALL 14V-138 WAS COMPLETED ON APRIL 17, 2014 AND FAILED ON APRIL 19, 2014 AND WAS REPEATED ON APRIL 20,. 2014.  IT FAILED AGAIN ON APRIL 21ST.  I CONTACTED THE DEALER AND NOTHING HAS HAPPENED SINCE AND THAT WAS OVER A WEEK AGO.  I CONTACTED NISSAN INFINITY AND HAVE A CASE NUMBER NOW.  I FEEL WE ARE DRIVING AN UNSAFE VEHICLE AND IT IS NOT BEING CORRECTED.    *TR
